testsuite.name: PhantomJS 1.9.7 (Mac OS X)

property.name: browser.fullName
property.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/534.34 (KHTML, like Gecko) PhantomJS/1.9.7 Safari/534.34

testcase.name: should NOT be able to save a user with an empty user name
should NOT be able to save a user with invalid email
should NOT be able to save a user with a user name more than 6 characters
should be able to save and load a valid user
should be able to get weather information for a valid place
should NOT be able to get weather information for an invalid place
